name: Bad Girls Wrestling Games 2022
description:
The wait for the thrilling Fighting Game is now over. A woman can conquer the world. Prove it to the world by your fighting skills. This wrestling game is specially designed for the peeps who really want to be a part of the wrestling world for now and for forever cuz we know that you are the future best fighters.

***Key Features***
- Show your expertise in this wwe games
- Multiple wrestlers to choose & train like a PRO
- Knockdown you fighter with thrilling action moves
- Real feel of wrestling in this ring game
- Multiple modes to polish your 3D fighting skills
- Addictive, easy & fun to play.

This is the best revolution 3d game ever which you never had seen or heard before. Fight for your revenge with your rivals. Download now and start playing this fight game cuz there will be no time of regret left behind.
